name: Aella Credit Limited
description: Developer of a diversified credit payments platform intended to offer a raft of financial services to underbanked users with a focus on lending. The company's debt-as-a-service model ensures that agents can have quick and easy access to funding through its partnerships with agency banks across the continent, enabling low-income underbanked households to have access to cash at competitive rates anytime.
one_liner: Developer of a diversified credit payments platform intended to offer a raft of financial services to underbanked users with a focus on lending. The company's debt-as-a-service model ensures that agents can have quick and easy access to funding through its partnerships with agency banks across the continent, enabling low-income underbanked households to have access to cash at competitive rates anytime.

name: AgFunder Inc.
description: Operator of an investment company intended for founders who are transforming food and agriculture. The company invests in entrepreneurs who are aiming to build the next generation of great agriculture and food technology companies, enabling founders and startups to raise funds for the business.
one_liner: Operator of an investment company intended for founders who are transforming food and agriculture. The company invests in entrepreneurs who are aiming to build the next generation of great agriculture and food technology companies, enabling founders and startups to raise funds for the business.

name: Albert Corp.
description: Developer of a financial advisory platform designed to assist users in tracking their finances by aggregating financial data. The company's platform includes bank accounts, credit cards, property, loans, and investments, enabling clients to get personalized recommendations, such as setting up a savings account or applying for a loan with a lower interest rate easily.
one_liner: Developer of a financial advisory platform designed to assist users in tracking their finances by aggregating financial data. The company's platform includes bank accounts, credit cards, property, loans, and investments, enabling clients to get personalized recommendations, such as setting up a savings account or applying for a loan with a lower interest rate easily.

name: Amalan International Pte Ltd
description: Operator of debt management programs intended to leverage affordable loan restructuring systems in cooperation with lenders. The company focuses on debt negotiations, providing financial literacy, and designing debt repayment plans, enabling clients to pay out debts in a timely manner and avoid penalties and high-interest rates.
one_liner: Operator of debt management programs intended to leverage affordable loan restructuring systems in cooperation with lenders. The company focuses on debt negotiations, providing financial literacy, and designing debt repayment plans, enabling clients to pay out debts in a timely manner and avoid penalties and high-interest rates.

name: AMWAL CORP
description: Operator of a debt-based crowdfunding platform intended to let retail investors lend short-term loans to SMEs. The company's platform facilitates investors to invest in small and medium businesses in the form of loans, enabling small businesses and companies to raise funds for growth while allowing investors to earn returns on their investments.
one_liner: Operator of a debt-based crowdfunding platform intended to let retail investors lend short-term loans to SMEs. The company's platform facilitates investors to invest in small and medium businesses in the form of loans, enabling small businesses and companies to raise funds for growth while allowing investors to earn returns on their investments.

name: Charlie Tango Romeo AI, LLC
description: Deverloper of talent and product hunt services platform intended to help startups grow and expand and also recruit talent. The company's platform operates as a matchmaking site for startups, talents, and investors, facilitating early-stage technology funding deals and early and later-stage funding to startups, enabling startups to access funds and investors and recruit talented employees to expand their businesses.
one_liner: Deverloper of talent and product hunt services platform intended to help startups grow and expand and also recruit talent. The company's platform operates as a matchmaking site for startups, talents, and investors, facilitating early-stage technology funding deals and early and later-stage funding to startups, enabling startups to access funds and investors and recruit talented employees to expand their businesses.

name: Arbi, Inc.
description: Developer of predictive analytics and artificial intelligence-based platform designed to enhance decision-making by law firms. The company's software analyses international arbitration cases and uses game theory models to predict case outcomes, enabling businesses and firms to achieve desired judicial outcomes in a cost-effective manner.
one_liner: Developer of predictive analytics and artificial intelligence-based platform designed to enhance decision-making by law firms. The company's software analyses international arbitration cases and uses game theory models to predict case outcomes, enabling businesses and firms to achieve desired judicial outcomes in a cost-effective manner.

name: Asaak Financial Services Limited Equity
description: Developer of a mobile-based microfinance platform designed to democratize financial services and help businesses grow with confidence. The company's platform manages lending operations, underwriting, application processing, investor management, and loan servicing, enabling clients to access various digital finance tools to reach customers.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile-based microfinance platform designed to democratize financial services and help businesses grow with confidence. The company's platform manages lending operations, underwriting, application processing, investor management, and loan servicing, enabling clients to access various digital finance tools to reach customers.

name: AutoFi, Inc.
description: Developer of an online auto financing platform designed to help prospective car buyers purchase and finance vehicles from a dealership's website. The company's platform connects car buyers to authorized dealerships and lenders to automate the car buying process through the mobile application, including vehicle selection and financing process, enabling customers to easily get finance and purchase vehicles in a hassle-free way.
one_liner: Developer of an online auto financing platform designed to help prospective car buyers purchase and finance vehicles from a dealership's website. The company's platform connects car buyers to authorized dealerships and lenders to automate the car buying process through the mobile application, including vehicle selection and financing process, enabling customers to easily get finance and purchase vehicles in a hassle-free way.

name: BSOS Holdings INC.
description: Operator of a B2B supply chain fintech company intended to solve the asset liquidity problem by blockchain and DeFi. The company's SaaS sustainable working capital management platform offers to democratize the global liquidity market and optimizes payment terms within the supply chain and uses blockchain to form trusted real-world assets, thereby helping businesses get liquidity, realize high-efficiency asset transactions that make supply chain financing easier and far more efficient.
one_liner: Operator of a B2B supply chain fintech company intended to solve the asset liquidity problem by blockchain and DeFi. The company's SaaS sustainable working capital management platform offers to democratize the global liquidity market and optimizes payment terms within the supply chain and uses blockchain to form trusted real-world assets, thereby helping businesses get liquidity, realize high-efficiency asset transactions that make supply chain financing easier and far more efficient.

name: Fairbanc Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an AI-powered mobile loan and payments platform intended to offer credit without collateral or credit history. The company's platform provides read digital footprints such as transaction history with large suppliers and data on the mobile phone to grant an instant digital credit line, enabling small and medium enterprises to purchase inventories from selected suppliers.
one_liner: Operator of an AI-powered mobile loan and payments platform intended to offer credit without collateral or credit history. The company's platform provides read digital footprints such as transaction history with large suppliers and data on the mobile phone to grant an instant digital credit line, enabling small and medium enterprises to purchase inventories from selected suppliers.

name: Kredivo Holdings Ltd
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to create disruptive and meaningful products in retail credit. The company's platform provides access to credit to a large number of people and gives e-commerce shoppers instant credit financing based on real-time analysis, enabling customers to enjoy simple, transparent, and honest pricing for all their credits.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to create disruptive and meaningful products in retail credit. The company's platform provides access to credit to a large number of people and gives e-commerce shoppers instant credit financing based on real-time analysis, enabling customers to enjoy simple, transparent, and honest pricing for all their credits.

name: Carabao Capital Global Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an online financing platform designed to offer short-term loans to small and medium enterprises. The company's platform offers collateral-free short-term working capital and trade financing, enabling businesses to grow and improve the course of opportunity.
one_liner: Developer of an online financing platform designed to offer short-term loans to small and medium enterprises. The company's platform offers collateral-free short-term working capital and trade financing, enabling businesses to grow and improve the course of opportunity.

name: Graviti Tech Inc.
description: Developer of a financial platform intended to offer customers buy now and pay later services for home appliances. The company's platform provides families to have easy access to basic services by financing sustainable household appliances, enabling customers to improve their quality of life.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform intended to offer customers buy now and pay later services for home appliances. The company's platform provides families to have easy access to basic services by financing sustainable household appliances, enabling customers to improve their quality of life.

name: Gravity Markets Limited
description: Developer of an online trading platform designed to trade in hybrid derivatives exchange. The company's platform uses ZK-powered volition technology to separate exchange and custody functions, enabling clients to eliminate counterparty risk and take full control of the assets.
one_liner: Developer of an online trading platform designed to trade in hybrid derivatives exchange. The company's platform uses ZK-powered volition technology to separate exchange and custody functions, enabling clients to eliminate counterparty risk and take full control of the assets.

name: Huma Technologies Inc.
description: Operator of a decentralized finance platform intended for lending to businesses and people. The company's platform offers loans against tokens as collateral and provides a transparent, and accessible financial infrastructure and a thriving ecosystem, enabling clients to tokenize and trade cashflow with credit on the blockchain system.
one_liner: Operator of a decentralized finance platform intended for lending to businesses and people. The company's platform offers loans against tokens as collateral and provides a transparent, and accessible financial infrastructure and a thriving ecosystem, enabling clients to tokenize and trade cashflow with credit on the blockchain system.

name: IMAN Group Ltd.
description: Operator of a financial technology platform intended for investors, merchants, and shoppers. The company's platform offers users a mobile application with investment and cash management services, credit payment services, and an online shopping platform, enabling users to invest and get funding ethically and in line with religious views and faith.
one_liner: Operator of a financial technology platform intended for investors, merchants, and shoppers. The company's platform offers users a mobile application with investment and cash management services, credit payment services, and an online shopping platform, enabling users to invest and get funding ethically and in line with religious views and faith.

name: Lendo Inc.
description: Provider of peer-to-peer lending services intended to help small and medium enterprises pre-finance their invoices. The company offers an alternative to regular short-term finance by borrowing money against outstanding invoices and individual lending through individuals as well as provides investment tracking services through application, enabling businesses and individuals to meet their short-term and working capital needs.
one_liner: Provider of peer-to-peer lending services intended to help small and medium enterprises pre-finance their invoices. The company offers an alternative to regular short-term finance by borrowing money against outstanding invoices and individual lending through individuals as well as provides investment tracking services through application, enabling businesses and individuals to meet their short-term and working capital needs.

name: Liwwa, Inc.
description: Developer of a peer-to-peer lending platform designed to build more substantial opportunities for people in the MENA region and beyond. The company's platform connects borrowers to investors and facilitates capital access for small businesses, enabling business owners to raise money to buy business assets and help investors to lend money for a profit.
one_liner: Developer of a peer-to-peer lending platform designed to build more substantial opportunities for people in the MENA region and beyond. The company's platform connects borrowers to investors and facilitates capital access for small businesses, enabling business owners to raise money to buy business assets and help investors to lend money for a profit.

name: Long-Term Stock Exchange, Inc.
description: Operator of an SEC-regulated national securities exchange intended to align companies and long-term investors with shared goals. The company's exchange provides software tools that help companies capitalize, hire, compensate, and grow from startup to initial public offering and beyond, enabling clients to raise capital while keeping their focus on long-term instead of short-term results.
one_liner: Operator of an SEC-regulated national securities exchange intended to align companies and long-term investors with shared goals. The company's exchange provides software tools that help companies capitalize, hire, compensate, and grow from startup to initial public offering and beyond, enabling clients to raise capital while keeping their focus on long-term instead of short-term results.

name: Aggra Technologies Private Limited
description: Developer of an automated debt collection platform designed to improve default recovery rates. The company's platform utilizes machine learning to automate all processes related to agent allocation, communication and settlement decision-making, assisting lenders to reduce their recovery costs as well as default rates, enabling users to become efficient and improve their debt recovery process while still maintaining friendly relations with their clients.
one_liner: Developer of an automated debt collection platform designed to improve default recovery rates. The company's platform utilizes machine learning to automate all processes related to agent allocation, communication and settlement decision-making, assisting lenders to reduce their recovery costs as well as default rates, enabling users to become efficient and improve their debt recovery process while still maintaining friendly relations with their clients.

name: Nowpay Inc.
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to focus on improving the financial wellness of corporate employees. The company's platform lets corporate workers receive part of their salaries in advance at almost any time during the month and the same is deducted from their monthly salary, enabling employees to access funding in times of emergency, and for corporations to improve employee happiness, productivity, and corporate loyalty.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to focus on improving the financial wellness of corporate employees. The company's platform lets corporate workers receive part of their salaries in advance at almost any time during the month and the same is deducted from their monthly salary, enabling employees to access funding in times of emergency, and for corporations to improve employee happiness, productivity, and corporate loyalty.

name: 1T9 Technology Private Limited
description: Provider of automotive leasing services intended to offer convenient alternatives to purchasing personal vehicles. The company offers various installment plans where the buyer can purchase and return vehicles after a certain period of time by paying interest for the lease contract, enabling customers to have an affordable and flexible way of operating a two-wheeler.
one_liner: Provider of automotive leasing services intended to offer convenient alternatives to purchasing personal vehicles. The company offers various installment plans where the buyer can purchase and return vehicles after a certain period of time by paying interest for the lease contract, enabling customers to have an affordable and flexible way of operating a two-wheeler.

name: ReliefClub, Inc.
description: Developer of a modern financial technology platform intended to provide premium financial services for both personal and business banking in a single application. The company's application provides a digital account with instant zero-interest loans and fees, tracks bills, and projects income, it is also developing non-financial SaaS (software-as-a-service) products for the small business market enabling users to enjoy digital banking services conveniently.
one_liner: Developer of a modern financial technology platform intended to provide premium financial services for both personal and business banking in a single application. The company's application provides a digital account with instant zero-interest loans and fees, tracks bills, and projects income, it is also developing non-financial SaaS (software-as-a-service) products for the small business market enabling users to enjoy digital banking services conveniently.

name: PawnHero Philippines Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an online banking platform designed to provide short-term loans to small business owners and unbanked people. The company's platform offers a convenient alternative to traditional brick-and-mortar pawnshops, enabling clients to get financial assistance without opening bank accounts.
one_liner: Developer of an online banking platform designed to provide short-term loans to small business owners and unbanked people. The company's platform offers a convenient alternative to traditional brick-and-mortar pawnshops, enabling clients to get financial assistance without opening bank accounts.

name: Qardy Holdings Limited
description: Qardy is the 1st lending aggregator marketplace in Egypt & MENA region that connects MSMEs with financial institutions.
one_liner: Qardy is the 1st lending aggregator marketplace in Egypt & MENA region that connects MSMEs with financial institutions.

name: QueroQuitar Ltda.
description: Developer of a debt negotiation platform designed to help users with the online negotiation process. The company's platform provides privacy, independence, and security in operations carried out by debtors, facilitating access to the solution of their debts, without intermediaries, and also provides information and tips on how to improve the financial planning of families, helping debtors and individuals to handle their debt online on a single platform.
one_liner: Developer of a debt negotiation platform designed to help users with the online negotiation process. The company's platform provides privacy, independence, and security in operations carried out by debtors, facilitating access to the solution of their debts, without intermediaries, and also provides information and tips on how to improve the financial planning of families, helping debtors and individuals to handle their debt online on a single platform.

name: Ricult, Inc.
description: Developer of a diagnostic, financial, and predictive analytics platform designed to help farmers increase farm productivity and access affordable loans. The company's platform uses a combination of traditional and alternative data sources like satellite imagery, agronomic models, and weather data to inform farmers on when to irrigate and harvest their fields, provides product price information, and determines whether a farmer is willing and able to repay a loan, enabling farmers to implement practices and get access to credit and crop buyers as well as helping banks in giving out loans, and helps with food processing mills in optimizing their supply chains and promoting sustainability.
one_liner: Developer of a diagnostic, financial, and predictive analytics platform designed to help farmers increase farm productivity and access affordable loans. The company's platform uses a combination of traditional and alternative data sources like satellite imagery, agronomic models, and weather data to inform farmers on when to irrigate and harvest their fields, provides product price information, and determines whether a farmer is willing and able to repay a loan, enabling farmers to implement practices and get access to credit and crop buyers as well as helping banks in giving out loans, and helps with food processing mills in optimizing their supply chains and promoting sustainability.

name: Ringkas Asia Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a digital mortgage platform intended to help democratize home ownership and make it accessible for everyone. The company allows a user to be pre-qualified for a home budget in a few steps, free of cost, works with trusted partners to help qualify people for mortgages, and matches unique profiles to pre-qualified rates, enabling users to help qualify for a mortgage for their dream home.
one_liner: Developer of a digital mortgage platform intended to help democratize home ownership and make it accessible for everyone. The company allows a user to be pre-qualified for a home budget in a few steps, free of cost, works with trusted partners to help qualify people for mortgages, and matches unique profiles to pre-qualified rates, enabling users to help qualify for a mortgage for their dream home.

name: Seedflex Technologies Pte Ltd
description: Developer of cashless commerce platform designed to prepare the business for a large unforeseen expense, an emergency repair, or an urgent replacement. The company's platform offers a pay-as-one-sell advance tool for online merchants to stay in control of their business, capital, and growth, enabling small businesses to stock up for peak seasons or big campaigns, avoid delays, negotiate bulk discounts, or explore new products.
one_liner: Developer of cashless commerce platform designed to prepare the business for a large unforeseen expense, an emergency repair, or an urgent replacement. The company's platform offers a pay-as-one-sell advance tool for online merchants to stay in control of their business, capital, and growth, enabling small businesses to stock up for peak seasons or big campaigns, avoid delays, negotiate bulk discounts, or explore new products.

name: Tammwel, Inc
description: Developer of a loan comparison platform intended to help customers and clients find financial offers. The company's platform offers quotes for financing automobiles, real estate, and personal loans and also features tools for tracking loan reimbursement and payments, enabling loan seekers to connect with commercial loan providers.
one_liner: Developer of a loan comparison platform intended to help customers and clients find financial offers. The company's platform offers quotes for financing automobiles, real estate, and personal loans and also features tools for tracking loan reimbursement and payments, enabling loan seekers to connect with commercial loan providers.

name: Aingel Corp.
description: Operator of modern financial tools intended to provide access to corporate cards and advanced spending controls. The company's tools help to manage online ad spending, reduce declined transactions, costly foreign exchange fees, and unfavorable currency conversion rates, and manage subscription payments together in one place, enabling companies to make it easy to pay and control business expenses, including cross-border transactions.
one_liner: Operator of modern financial tools intended to provide access to corporate cards and advanced spending controls. The company's tools help to manage online ad spending, reduce declined transactions, costly foreign exchange fees, and unfavorable currency conversion rates, and manage subscription payments together in one place, enabling companies to make it easy to pay and control business expenses, including cross-border transactions.

name: Trust IQ Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered credit risk, identity and acquisition solutions platform designed to help lenders better serve underbanked consumers. The company's platform offers consumer credit score and traditional credit score checks based on social, web and mobile data, enabling lenders to detect identity fraud, verify application data and evaluate credit risk and confidently lend to financially invisible consumers who are not covered by credit bureaus.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered credit risk, identity and acquisition solutions platform designed to help lenders better serve underbanked consumers. The company's platform offers consumer credit score and traditional credit score checks based on social, web and mobile data, enabling lenders to detect identity fraud, verify application data and evaluate credit risk and confidently lend to financially invisible consumers who are not covered by credit bureaus.

name: Citius Holdings Limited
description: Provider of an acquisition, customer management and dynamic profiling platform intended to offer services to financial institutions in SME lending. The company's acquisition, customer management and dynamic profiling platform identifies and extends credit to SMEs in high volumes via exclusive origination channels built via strategic partnerships with large enterprises and it also gains access to the SME's information cashflow information from reliable sources and its data analytics generates a credit and business profile for these SMEs, enabling financial institutions to prioritizes on boarding, tigers event-based marketing and predict customer behavior in and gain insights related to propensity, behavior and credit worthiness.
one_liner: Provider of an acquisition, customer management and dynamic profiling platform intended to offer services to financial institutions in SME lending. The company's acquisition, customer management and dynamic profiling platform identifies and extends credit to SMEs in high volumes via exclusive origination channels built via strategic partnerships with large enterprises and it also gains access to the SME's information cashflow information from reliable sources and its data analytics generates a credit and business profile for these SMEs, enabling financial institutions to prioritizes on boarding, tigers event-based marketing and predict customer behavior in and gain insights related to propensity, behavior and credit worthiness.

name: LendSquare USA Inc
description: Provider of a crowdfunding platform. The company's platform allows small businesses to finance growth by borrowing money from their customers and communities.
one_liner: Provider of a crowdfunding platform. The company's platform allows small businesses to finance growth by borrowing money from their customers and communities.

name: iBillionaire, Inc.
description: Developer of an investment advisory platform designed to help investors gain access to the investment decisions of the world's most successful billionaires. The company's investment advisory platform provides a comparison of stocks and their movement predictions, enabling users to get suggestions about investment.
one_liner: Developer of an investment advisory platform designed to help investors gain access to the investment decisions of the world's most successful billionaires. The company's investment advisory platform provides a comparison of stocks and their movement predictions, enabling users to get suggestions about investment.

description: Developer of a repayment platform for student debt. The company provides a personal finance platform that offers recommendations to users for repaying their student loans.
one_liner: Developer of a repayment platform for student debt. The company provides a personal finance platform that offers recommendations to users for repaying their student loans.

name: Booth FinTech Pvt. Ltd.
description: InstaPaisa leverages Big Data, and machine learning algorithms to make automated lending decisions and originate loans online in India.
one_liner: InstaPaisa leverages Big Data, and machine learning algorithms to make automated lending decisions and originate loans online in India.

name: Reali Loans, Inc.
description: Provider of an online refinancing platform intended to offer home loan and related services. The company's online refinancing platform offers various services like re-financing, real-time rate quotes, e-signature platforms for paperwork and secure document upload portals, enabling clients to avail transparent and advanced mortgage finance system.

The company's online refinancing platform offers various services like re-financing, real-time rate quotes, e-signature platforms for paperwork and secure document upload portals, enabling clients to avail transparent and advanced mortgage finance system.

one_liner: Developer of a financial software to manage debt. The company has developed a financial software which allows its users to track their debt, make payments and monitor credit.

name: Homebot, Inc.
description: Provider of a content platform for homeowners. The company's application offers a financial dashboard and planner for homeowners to earn money by working with leaders in the mortgage lending and real estate industries.
one_liner: Provider of a content platform for homeowners. The company's application offers a financial dashboard and planner for homeowners to earn money by working with leaders in the mortgage lending and real estate industries.

name: LATAM FINANCIAL SERVICES, INC.
description: Developer of a mortgage purchase software designed to provide financial advisory services for mortgage debts. The company's software provides a form for basic information about the current mortgage credit, helps in finding good bidders with the financial institution to close the terms of the transfer of the mortgage, enabling users to avail mortgage debt purchase without any hassle.

The company's software provides a form for basic information about the current mortgage credit, helps in finding good bidders with the financial institution to close the terms of the transfer of the mortgage, enabling users to avail mortgage debt purchase without any hassle.

name: Artivest Holdings
description: Developer of an online investment platform designed to offer an investment opportunity in private equity and hedge funds. The company's online investment platform employed advanced encryption technology to effectively provide bank-level security, enabling users to get an assurance of safe payments.
one_liner: Developer of an online investment platform designed to offer an investment opportunity in private equity and hedge funds. name: StreamLoan, Inc.
description: Provider of a mortgage lending platform intended to make the loan (purchase & refinance) process simple, efficient, and digital for both the lender and customer. The company's mortgage lending platform enables property buyers to collaborate with banks and financial institutions to secure home and property loans by keeping borrowers at the center of the home buying experience by giving them complete control of who sees what data, enabling them to significantly reduce transaction time by speeding all the steps in the lending process.

The company's mortgage lending platform enables property buyers to collaborate with banks and financial institutions to secure home and property loans by keeping borrowers at the center of the home buying experience by giving them complete control of who sees what data, enabling them to significantly reduce transaction time by speeding all the steps in the lending process.

name: Insurgent, Inc.
description: Developer of an online funding platform designed to empower small businesses by giving them access to the capital they need to thrive. The company's platform make the process simple by leveraging data and technology to bring fairly priced capital directly to the merchant and flip the capital search process on its head by bringing capital offers direct to the business with no credit checks, 2 minute applications and high approval rates, enabling merchant to apply for fund in minutes and get fund as soon as the next business day.
one_liner: Developer of an online funding platform designed to empower small businesses by giving them access to the capital they need to thrive. The company's platform make the process simple by leveraging data and technology to bring fairly priced capital directly to the merchant and flip the capital search process on its head by bringing capital offers direct to the business with no credit checks, 2 minute applications and high approval rates, enabling merchant to apply for fund in minutes and get fund as soon as the next business day.

name: SwitchMe Technologies and Services Private Limited.
description: Provider of financial and lending services. The company offers their customers home loans and and other lending schemes when they wish to switch their home loans manually.
one_liner: Provider of financial and lending services. The company offers their customers home loans and and other lending schemes when they wish to switch their home loans manually.

name: Finnoble Solutions, Inc.
description: Powering a mobile offers service for banks to give users rewards via transaction history.
one_liner: Powering a mobile offers service for banks to give users rewards via transaction history.
